admin.apiUsage.title: API Usage Audit

admin.invitations.emailNotConfigured: Email is not configured. The invitation will be created but no email will be sent.

admin.lessons.form.title: Title
admin.lessons.generateDesc: Use AI to automatically create a complete language lesson with questions.
admin.lessons.generatingHint: This may take 30-60 seconds. Please don't close this page.
admin.lessons.noQuestions: No questions in this lesson yet.
admin.lessons.tip1: Choose a specific topic (e.g., 'hotel vocabulary' not just 'travel')
admin.lessons.tip2: Match the difficulty to the CEFR level of the unit
admin.lessons.tip3: Generated lessons are saved as drafts - review before publishing
admin.lessons.tip4: You can edit questions after generation in the lesson editor
admin.lessons.title: Lesson Management
admin.lessons.topicHint: Be specific about what vocabulary or phrases you want to teach.

admin.settings.globalApiKey.description: Set a global OpenAI API key that will be used as a fallback for users who haven't configured their own key.
admin.settings.globalApiKey.label: API Key
admin.settings.globalApiKey.noteText: If a user has their own API key configured, it will be used instead of the global key. The global key is only used as a fallback.
admin.settings.globalApiKey.title: Global OpenAI API Key
admin.settings.hearts.description: Control the gamification hearts system for all users.
admin.settings.hearts.note: When disabled globally, users won't lose hearts for incorrect answers. You can also disable hearts for individual users in the {link} page.

legal.imprint.notConfigured: Imprint information is not configured. Please contact the administrator.
legal.imprint.title: Imprint
legal.privacy.contact.text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:
legal.privacy.contact.title: Contact
legal.privacy.cookies.text: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and remember your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.
legal.privacy.cookies.title: Cookies
legal.privacy.dataCollection.item3: Usage data to improve our service
legal.privacy.dataCollection.text: We collect the following types of information:
legal.privacy.dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
legal.privacy.dataUse.text: Your data is used to provide and improve our language learning service, track your progress, and personalize your learning experience.
legal.privacy.dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
legal.privacy.intro.text: We take your privacy seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal.privacy.intro.title: Introduction
legal.privacy.rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can delete your account at any time from your profile settings.
legal.privacy.rights.title: Your Rights
legal.privacy.security.item1: Passwords are securely hashed using bcrypt algorithm and never stored in plain text
legal.privacy.security.item2: OpenAI API keys are encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption before storage
legal.privacy.security.item3: Authentication uses secure JWT tokens with short expiration times and refresh token rotation
legal.privacy.security.item4: All data transmission is encrypted via HTTPS/TLS
legal.privacy.security.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
legal.privacy.security.title: Data Security
legal.privacy.thirdParty.text: We may use third-party services like OpenAI for AI-powered features. When you use these features, your data may be processed by these services according to their privacy policies.
legal.privacy.thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
